name: Corrupted Reality
description:
This game is a test game.

Controls:

Press W A S D or arrow keys to move

Press Left Shift or J to zoom in and Space or K to zoom out the camera.

Press ESC to open settings.

White things are ground. They are harmless.

Yellow things are checkpoints. You can set your spawn there by touching them.

Don't touch red things. They teleport you to the last checkpoint.

Pink things are keys. You can destroy purple walls by touching it.

And finally, blue things are portals. You can finish the level by touching it.

It might be hard for you if you are color blind people at first but when you memorise the shapes of the objects , I think you can play the game like the people who are not color blind (if you can distinguish between white and red)

You might need to be a good player and need a lot of patience (I had a hard time trying to pass the levels I made).

I used the following programs/websites while making on this game:

Unity

beepbox.co

sfxr.me
